body_html:
I am opposed to accepting PRs to old release branches.
The biggest reason is, bazel had a lot of backwards incompatible changes.
When fixing the build for latest bazel version included in the dockerfiles in this branch.

Unless anyone else has any objections, I will close this PR.

body:
I am opposed to accepting PRs to old release branches.
The biggest reason is, bazel had a lot of backwards incompatible changes.
When fixing the build for latest bazel version included in the dockerfiles in this branch.

Unless anyone else has any objections, I will close this PR.
